Outcome: Orthodontic tooth movement in mm (3 months)
Reasons for GRADE if not High: Downgraded one level for risk of bias: blinding of participants and personnel unclear in Aboul‐Ela 2011 and blinding of outcome assessment unclear in Leethanakul 2014. Also downgraded one level for indirectness.

Outcome: Harms arising during the course of orthodontic treatment
Reasons for GRADE if not High: Downgraded one level for risk of bias in Aboul‐Ela 2011. Also downgraded two levels for imprecision.
